name: Maloof Skatepark
description: World-class skatepark designed by California Skateparks. Deep bowl, flowing snake run, and technical street section.
history: Built with backing from the Maloof family (of Maloof Money Cup fame). One of the premier parks in the outer boroughs.
bestTimes: Early mornings on weekdays. Competition-level park gets packed on weekends.
transitDirections: 7 train to Flushing-Main St, then Q65 bus.

detailedNotes.terrain: Features include bowl, snake run, ledges, stairs, handrails. Well-maintained concrete construction.
detailedNotes.culture: Part of the Queens skate scene in Flushing. Built with backing from the Maloof family (of Maloof Money Cup fame). One of the premier parks in the outer boroughs.
detailedNotes.tips: Best approach: 7 train to Flushing-Main St, then Q65 bus.. Early mornings on weekdays. Competition-level park gets packed on weekends.
detailedNotes.warnings: Public skatepark â€” standard park etiquette applies.
